title: Spank or Treat
description: [Siren Sensations: Erotic Consensual BDSM Romance, M/F/M, M/M/F with M/M, voyeurism, exhibitionism, Shibari, spanking, flogging, caning, sex toys, HEA]Seth and Leah are throwing a Halloween party for their friends from the Suncoast Society. Melancholy memories swirl through the minds of many of the attendees even as they have a howling good time. Who knew kinksters could have so much fun carving pumpkins, or that pool games could be so…dirty?When Tilly’s in charge of the entertainment, you know things will get raunchy. That’s what makes it so much fun!But what’s that lurking in the spooktacular display in the front yard? Is it a prankster…or are the kinksters inside not the only ones in high spirits on this spank or treat night?A Siren Erotic Romance
author: Tymber Dalton
